fields.title: The Social Media Frenzy - Scenario 1
fields.description: Adjoa finds a Facebook post claiming ginger tea prevents all illnesses. What should she do?

fields.text: Share it with friends because it sounds helpful.

fields.description: Adjoa feels good but later regrets it when she learns the post misled people to stop medication.

fields.text: Ask her elder sister and look it up online.

fields.description: She discovers the post is partly true but exaggerated and informs her friends not to share it.
Adjoa avoids spreading the post but later regrets not intervening when others believed it.

fields.title: Scenario 2: The Influencer's Endorsement
fields.description: Adjoa sees a post with a famous doctor endorsing the tea. She feels suspicious.

fields.text: Share the message because it sounds convincing.

fields.description: The false message spreads quickly, misleading more people.

fields.text: Search online to verify if the doctor endorsed it.

fields.description: Adjoa finds out the picture is fake and informs her friends.

fields.text: Ask friends on group chat if the message is true.

fields.description: The friends are unsure, and the false message continues to spread.
